name: Scares At Sundown
description:
This is a game that I made in the Godot game engine. This is my first horror game that I made using this engine, so I hope you guys enjoy. I'm still actively developing it, so there will be future updates to it.

You are in what appears to be a maze. Inside this maze, there are five orbs. All five must be collected before you can advance to the next level.
